section_title: Financial and Technical Support for non-Annex I Communications:
sentences: On 6 November, the SBI adopted draft conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2001/CRP.3) taking note of progress made by non-Annex I Parties in the preparation of their national communications and greenhouse gas abatement projects submitted for funding and recommending these projects be brought to the attention of the GEF, and other bilateral and multilateral financing institutions.
enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
